    VCX Credential API.

    • Method Detail

      • credentialCreateWithMsgid

        public static CompletableFuture<GetCredentialCreateMsgidResult> credentialCreateWithMsgid(String sourceId,
                                                                                          int connectionHandle,
                                                                                          String msgId)
                                                                                   throws VcxException
        Create a credential based off of a known message id for a given connection.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - Institution's personal identification for the credential, should be unique.
        connectionHandle - connection to query for credential offer
        msgId - msg_id that contains the credential offer
        Returns:
        A created credential
        Throws:
        VcxException - the vcx exception.

      • credentialSendRequest

        public static CompletableFuture<String> credentialSendRequest(int credentialHandle,
                                                              int connectionHandle,
                                                              int paymentHandle)
                                                       throws VcxException
        Approves the credential offer and submits a credential request.
        The result will be a credential stored in the prover's wallet.
        Parameters:
        credentialHandle - credential handle that was provided during creation. Used to identify credential object.
        connectionHandle - Connection handle that identifies pairwise connection
        paymentHandle - currently unused
        Returns:
        A created credential
        Throws:
        VcxException
        See Also:
        VCX JAVA Demo - Credential offer Example

      • credentialGetRequestMsg

        public static CompletableFuture<String> credentialGetRequestMsg(int credentialHandle,
                                                                String myPwDid,
                                                                String theirPwDid,
                                                                int paymentHandle)
                                                         throws VcxException
        Approves the credential offer and gets the credential request message that can be sent to the specified connection.
        Parameters:
        credentialHandle - credential handle that was provided during creation. Used to identify credential object
        myPwDid - Use Connection api (vcx_connection_get_pw_did) with specified connection_handle to retrieve your pw_did
        theirPwDid - Use Connection api (vcx_connection_get_their_pw_did) with specified connection_handle to retrieve theri pw_did
        paymentHandle - currently unused
        Returns:
        A created credential
        Throws:
        VcxException - the vcx exception.

      • credentialSerialize

        public static CompletableFuture<String> credentialSerialize(int credentailHandle)
                                                     throws VcxException
        Takes the credential object and returns a json string of all its attributes
        Parameters:
        credentailHandle - Credential handle that was provided during creation. Used to identify credential object.
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        See Also:
        "Refer credentialSendRequest example for credential demo", credentialSendRequest(int, int, int)

      • credentialDeserialize

        public static CompletableFuture<Integer> credentialDeserialize(String serializedCredential)
                                                        throws VcxException
        Takes a json string representing an credential object and recreates an object matching the json
        Parameters:
        serializedCredential - json string representing a credential object.
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - the vcx exception. 
        
   Example:
   // Accept credential
         String threadId = JsonPath.read(payloadMessage, "$.~thread.thid");
         String credentialRecord = WalletApi.getRecordWallet("credential", threadId, "").get();
         String serializedCredential = JsonPath.read(credentialRecord, "$.value");
   // Deserialize Credential
         serializedCredential = JsonPath.parse(serializedCredential)
                 .set("$.data.holder_sm.state.RequestSent.connection_handle", Integer.toUnsignedLong(connectionHandle))
                 .jsonString();
         int credentialHandle = CredentialApi.credentialDeserialize(serializedCredential).get();
   // Credential Update State
         int credentialState = CredentialApi.credentialUpdateState(credentialHandle).get();

   // Serialize the object
         serializedCredential = CredentialApi.credentialSerialize(credentialHandle).get();
   // Update Record Wallet
         WalletApi.updateRecordWallet("credential", threadId, serializedCredential).get();
   // Credential Release
         CredentialApi.credentialRelease(credentialHandle);
        See Also:
        VCX JAVA Demo - Credential offer Example

      • getCredential

        public static CompletableFuture<String> getCredential(int credentialHandle)
                                               throws VcxException
        Retrieve information about a stored credential in user's wallet, including credential id and the credential itself.
        Parameters:
        credentialHandle - credential handle that was provided during creation. Used to identify credential object.
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.

      • deleteCredential

        public static CompletableFuture<String> deleteCredential(int credentialHandle)
                                                  throws VcxException
        Delete a Credential from the wallet and release its handle.
        Parameters:
        credentialHandle - handle of the credential to delete.
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.

      • credentialUpdateState

        public static CompletableFuture<Integer> credentialUpdateState(int credentialHandle)
                                                        throws VcxException
        Query the agency for the received messages. Checks for any messages changing state in the credential object and updates the state attribute. If it detects a credential it will store the credential in the wallet.
        Parameters:
        credentialHandle - Credential handle that was provided during creation. Used to identify credential object.
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        See Also:
        "Refer credentialSendRequest example for credential demo", credentialSendRequest(int, int, int)

      • credentialUpdateStateWithMessage

        public static CompletableFuture<Integer> credentialUpdateStateWithMessage(int credentialHandle,
                                                                          String message)
                                                                   throws VcxException
        Update the state of the credential based on the given message.
        Parameters:
        credentialHandle - Credential handle that was provided during creation. Used to identify credential object.
        message - message to process for state changes.
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.

      • credentialGetState

        public static CompletableFuture<Integer> credentialGetState(int credentialHandle)
                                                     throws VcxException
        Get the current state of the credential object
        Parameters:
        credentialHandle - Credential handle that was provided during creation.
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.

      • credentialRelease

        public static int credentialRelease(int credentialHandle)
                             throws VcxException
        Releases the credential object by de-allocating memory.
        Parameters:
        credentialHandle - Credential handle that was provided during creation. Used to access credential object.
        Returns:
        Success
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        See Also:
        "Refer credentialSendRequest example for credential demo", credentialSendRequest(int, int, int)

      • credentialGetOffers

        public static CompletableFuture<String> credentialGetOffers(int connectionHandle)
                                                     throws VcxException
        Queries agency for credential offers from the given connection.
        Parameters:
        connectionHandle - Connection to query for credential offers.
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        See Also:
        "Refer credentialSendRequest example for credential demo", credentialSendRequest(int, int, int)

      • credentialCreateWithOffer

        public static CompletableFuture<Integer> credentialCreateWithOffer(String sourceId,
                                                                   String credentialOffer)
                                                            throws VcxException
        Create a Credential object that requests and receives a credential for an institution
        Parameters:
        sourceId - Institution's personal identification for the credential, should be unique.
        credentialOffer - credential offer received via "vcx_credential_get_offers"
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        See Also:
        "Refer credentialSendRequest example for credential demo", credentialSendRequest(int, int, int)
